name: Luna, a Story That Has Nothing To Do With Dogs, So Maybe Don't Play It if You Want Something About Dogs
name_original: Luna, a Story That Has Nothing To Do With Dogs, So Maybe Don't Play It if You Want Something About Dogs
description:
This is a Short Novel Developed for the Bad Art Visual Novel Jam

Story and Writing are by EvilRoda

And Programming and art were by me: "Kamataya"

We hope you like it.
